Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast!

Name: Opal Mountain
Description: Interesting place for gem hounds, theres also a cool dry lake bed nearby.

Name: Lassen Volcanic
Description: Increadbily cool volcanic area, there are some really cool lava tubes throughout the area.

Name: Mt. Baden Powell
Description: This is a good trail, but the coolest part is an off shoot trail which leads to an abandoned silver mine.

Name: Gem Hill
Description: Easy place to look for rocks and gems, just outside of Rosmond and an old gold mine.

Name: Burro Schmidt Tunnel
Description: Tunnel made by one man through out his life time. Theres a lot of motocross spots nearby.
